<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function removes any redundant load immediates. It has two level</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loops - The outer loop finds the load immediates BBI that could be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to replace following redundancy. The inner loop scans instructions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after BBI to find redundancy and update kill/dead flags accordingly. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AfterBBI is the same as BBI, it is redundant, otherwise any instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that modify the def register of BBI would break the scanning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DeadOrKillToUnset is a pointer to the previous operand that had the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// kill/dead flag set. It keeps track of the def register of BBI, the use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers of AfterBBIs and the def registers of AfterBBIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a3bbf276657ebe5de723f93bc95498b6f"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a3bbf276657ebe5de723f93bc95498b6f">removeRedundantLIs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Remove redundant load immediates from MBB:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.dump(); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> InstrsToErase;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;begin(); BBI != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;end(); ++BBI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip load immediate that is marked to be erased later because it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot be used to replace any other instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstrsToErase.contains(&amp;&#42;BBI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip non-load immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = BBI-&gt;getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opc != PPC::LI &amp;&amp; Opc != PPC::LI8 &amp;&amp; Opc != PPC::LIS &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Opc != PPC::LIS8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip load immediate, where the operand is a relocation (e.g., $r3 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LI target-flags(ppc-lo) %const.0).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BBI-&gt;getOperand(1).isImm())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).isReg() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected a register for the first operand&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Scanning after load immediate: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; BBI-&gt;dump(););</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        int64&#95;t Imm = BBI-&gt;getOperand(1).getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;DeadOrKillToUnset = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).isDead()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DeadOrKillToUnset = &amp;BBI-&gt;getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; Kill flag of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;DeadOrKillToUnset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; from load immediate &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;BBI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; is a unsetting candidate\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This loop scans instructions after BBI to see if there is any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// redundant load immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AfterBBI = std::next(BBI); AfterBBI != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">             ++AfterBBI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Track the operand that kill Reg. We would unset the kill flag of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operand if there is a following redundant load immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KillIdx = AfterBBI-&gt;findRegisterUseOperandIdx(Reg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can&#39;t just clear implicit kills, so if we encounter one, stop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// looking further.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">GOTDefUsePair &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> DefInst;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vector of def/ues pairs in this basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;GOTDefUsePair, 4&gt;</a> CandPairs;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MadeChange = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run through all of the instructions in the basic block and try to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// collect potential pairs of GOT indirect access instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;begin(); BBI != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;end(); ++BBI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for the initial GOT indirect load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#abefb312df5790c0f83c5e739316b9047">isGOTPLDpc</a>(&#42;BBI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">          GOTDefUsePair CurrentPair&#123;BBI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    PPC::NoRegister, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CandPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(CurrentPair);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We haven&#39;t encountered any new PLD instructions, nothing to check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CandPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run through the candidate pairs and see if any of the registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defined in the PLD instructions are used by this instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: the size of CandPairs can change in the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0; Idx &lt; CandPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(); Idx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">          GOTDefUsePair &amp;Pair = CandPairs&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The instruction does not use or modify this PLD&#39;s def reg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ignore it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BBI-&gt;readsRegister(Pair.DefReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">              !BBI-&gt;modifiesRegister(Pair.DefReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The use needs to be used in the address computation and not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as the register being stored for a store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;UseOp =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/#ab9ae825f3850c051bb17ddb6d1059d13">hasPCRelativeForm</a>(&#42;BBI) ? &amp;BBI-&gt;getOperand(2) : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for a valid use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseOp &amp;&amp; UseOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() &amp;&amp; UseOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() == Pair.DefReg &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">              UseOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a69544ec8658eadeed98245dc37c3a541">isUse</a>() &amp;&amp; UseOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4046212ebc647b17e811837ae4ea3afd">isKill</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Pair.UseInst = BBI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Pair.UseReg = BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">            ValidPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Pair);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CandPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a563ffc2ff61c499b3be2e00100cb72fa">erase</a>(CandPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>() + Idx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Go through all of the pairs and check for any more valid uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pair = ValidPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>(); Pair != ValidPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(); Pair++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We shouldn&#39;t be here if we don&#39;t have a valid pair.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Pair-&gt;UseInst.isValid() &amp;&amp; Pair-&gt;StillValid &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Kept an invalid def/use pair for GOT PCRel opt&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have found a potential pair. Search through the instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between the def and the use to see if it is valid to mark this as a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// linker opt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> BBI = Pair-&gt;DefInst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++BBI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; BBI != Pair-&gt;UseInst; ++BBI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBI-&gt;readsRegister(Pair-&gt;UseReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">              BBI-&gt;modifiesRegister(Pair-&gt;UseReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Pair-&gt;StillValid = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Pair-&gt;StillValid)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The load/store instruction that uses the address from the PLD will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either use a register (for a store) or define a register (for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load). That register will be added as an implicit def to the PLD</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and as an implicit use on the second memory op. This is a precaution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to prevent future passes from using that register between the two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> ImplDef =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af2c351dad09a71aa08e1d85c67ae6e53">MachineOperand::CreateReg</a>(Pair-&gt;UseReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> ImplUse =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af2c351dad09a71aa08e1d85c67ae6e53">MachineOperand::CreateReg</a>(Pair-&gt;UseReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Pair-&gt;DefInst-&gt;addOperand(ImplDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Pair-&gt;UseInst-&gt;addOperand(ImplUse);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Context = MF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a752546c51633c140d9ca4ab98b4781b6">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;Symbol = Context.createNamedTempSymbol(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;pcrel&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> PCRelLabel =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a081ab7d53b85dfd7a2f8609689147393">MachineOperand::CreateMCSymbol</a>(Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppcii/#ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffaf4ba2908fdc36ea179a9e3f8eda40637">PPCII::MO&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT&#95;FLAG</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Pair-&gt;DefInst-&gt;addOperand(&#42;MF, PCRelLabel);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Pair-&gt;UseInst-&gt;addOperand(&#42;MF, PCRelLabel);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MadeChange |= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MadeChange;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function removes redundant pairs of accumulator prime/unprime</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions. In some situations, it&#39;s possible the compiler inserts an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accumulator prime instruction followed by an unprime instruction (e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when we store an accumulator after restoring it from a spill). If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accumulator is not used between the two, they can be removed. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function removes these redundant pairs from basic blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm is quite straightforward - every time we encounter a prime</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, the primed register is added to a candidate set. Any use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other than a prime removes the candidate from the set and any de-prime</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of a current candidate marks both the prime and de-prime for removal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This way we ensure we only remove prime/de-prime &#42;pairs&#42; with no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intervening uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a6799c4d668d7c7dd663b83adcf3667cc"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a6799c4d668d7c7dd663b83adcf3667cc">removeAccPrimeUnprime</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> InstrsToErase;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initially, none of the acc registers are candidates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Candidates(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PPC::UACCRCRegClass.getNumRegs(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;BBI : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instrs()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = BBI.getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are visiting a xxmtacc instruction, we add it and its operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register to the candidate set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opc == PPC::XXMTACC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Acc = BBI.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PPC::ACCRCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Acc) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected register for XXMTACC&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Candidates&#91;Acc - PPC::ACC0&#93; = &amp;BBI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are visiting a xxmfacc instruction and its operand register is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the candidate set, we mark the two instructions for removal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opc == PPC::XXMFACC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Acc = BBI.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected register for XXMFACC&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
